name: thomas.brisbout
body:
Work Experience
---------------------

### Software Consultant, [Dassault Systemes Industry Services][DSIS]
#### Nov 2011 - Present

Consulting for several customer projects for French manufacturers in Aerospace and Automotive industry.
Technical lead of customer specific development (Requirements, Realization, Deployment).
Supervision of development on specific subject.Key intermediary between R&D teams and customer.
Prototyping and Development of Proof of Concepts for pre-sale activities.
Modern web applications development, RESTful web services.
Software Factory and Development Environment implementation.


### Software Developer, [Keonys][KEONYS]
#### Oct 2009 - Oct 2011

In charge of specification, development, deployment and support of the PLM software customizations.
Technical Expertise on ENOVIA V6.
Key contact with the customer for web issues.


### Software Developer, Intern, Dassault Data Services
#### Apr 2009 - Sep 2009

Development of an applicative security prototype for a cloud deployment of the ENOVIA V6 PLM system.
Industrialization done and integration in a whole solution sold to aerospace OEMs.


### Web Developer, Intern, Meteo Omnium
#### May 2008 - Aug 2008

Re-design of the company website.
Development of web applications for customer data management.
This internship led to a fixed-term contract.
PHP - MySQL - ActionScript - Javascript - Web design.


### Web Developer, Intern, Skignaletiks
#### May 2007 - Jul 2007

Creation of the company website.
Development of a web application displaying ski station domain.

***

Competencies
---------------------

### Current Programming Stack
* Front-end
	* HTML5 + CSS3 + Javascript
	* libraries (Bootstrap, Modernizr, jQuery, LESS)
* Back-end
	* Java (JEE, Spring)
	* Play2
* Scripting
	* Shell

### Software Factory
* Editors: *Eclipse, Sublime Text, Vim*
* Source Code Management: *Git, SVN*
* Build Management: *Maven, Ant*
* Continous Integration: *Jenkins*
* Issue Tracker: *Jira, Mantis, Redmine*
* DevOps: *Chef* 
* Virtualization: *VMWare, VirtualBox, Vagrant*
* Operating Systems: *Linux (Ubuntu, openSuse, Red Hat), Windows*

### Functional
Project Lifecycle Management  
Agile Methods (Scrum, Kanban)  
SOLID Principles  


### Languages
French (native)  
English (fluent)  

### Productivity
Office Tools  
Pomodoro Technique  
GTD  

### Others
Design (Principles & tools)  

### Interests
Web & Mobile Technologies  
Computing & Open Source  
Board sports  
E-sports  
Event organization  

***

Education
---------------------

### Master of Science in Advanced Technology Management, [University of Wolverhampton][WLV]
#### Sep 2008 - Oct 2009

New Product Development, CAD/CAM interface, 
Rapid Prototyping, Research Methods,
Sustainability & lifecycle engineering,
Strategic Quality Management. 
Postgraduate dissertation about applicative security of a cloud-based PLM Software.


### Engineering Degree in Generalized Product Design, [Institute of Advanced Industrial Technology ESTIA][ESTIA]
#### Sep 2006 - Sept 2009 

Product Lifecycle Management & Computing Specialization.
Trilingual engineering course in computing, mechanics and electronics.


### Preparation for the competitive entrance examinations of French Engineering Schools, A.Artaud High School
#### Sep 2004 - Jul 2006

Intensive course about mathematics, physics and engineering science.


### A-level with distinction in Electrotechnology, G.de Gennes High School
#### 2004

***

References
---------------------

### HARMEGNIES Ronan
Senior Software Architect, Dassault Systemes  
Technical supervisor for 3 years  
<ronan.hargmenies@3ds.com>

### LAROCHE Fabien
Project Manager, Dassault Systemes  
Project Leader for 3 years  
<fabien.laroche@3ds.com>

### BOURDAIS Nicolas
Functional Consultant, Oracle  
Former internship tutor at Dassault Systemes  
<nicolas.bourdais@oracle.com>
	
### DUPRAT Guillaume
Technical account manager, Mediatech
Former internship tutor at Skignaletiks   
<guillaume.duprat@mediatech.fr>
